segments.text: Looking at this kitchen scene, everything seems so ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman is polishing that plate meticulously, her back to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is gushing from the faucet, filling the sink and spilling over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's ridiculous how the puddle is spreading across the floor unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea her cabinets are getting soaked, or that her foot is wet already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stacked dishes on the counter, waiting to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, turning to the kids, the boy is up on that unstable two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble right down, cookies flying everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, expectant, her arm raised like she's begging for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, sneaking cookies when they shouldn't.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a tidy garden outside, mocking the disaster inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope someone turns off that faucet before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup is a recipe for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
